reviews.name: Kidde Emergency 2-Story Escape Ladder, 13'
reviews.reviewText:
In the instructions for this item it says to only deploy it once and then throw it away. It also says to throw it away after 10 years even if it has not been used.
My family planned on practicing with this item numerous times so we would be prepared for the real thing. Why on earth would it say to throw it away after one use??????
Maybe the fabric is inferior and will rip on the first use. I can't decide rather I should take a chance and deploy it once or just throw it under the bed and hope we never really need to use it.I would recomend you buy a product that can be used more than one time. Thanks and happy shopping.
reviews.title: Great product,stupid rules

reviews.name: Kidde Emergency 2-Story Escape Ladder, 13'
reviews.reviewText:
Luckily I haven't had to use this item yet. It appears very sturdy and of good quality and I wouldn't be afraid to step out on it to escape a fire.

One thing to know is that it has packing materials in the box so open it and discard all the packing so the ladder will be ready to go if you ever need it.

I have mine under the bed right next to the window in case of an emergency.
reviews.title: Sturdy Fire Escape Ladder

reviews.name: Kidde Emergency 2-Story Escape Ladder, 13'
reviews.reviewText: Escape ladder is of very good quality, worth the price, and provides my family with peace of mind.
reviews.title: Peace of mind

reviews.name: Kidde Emergency 2-Story Escape Ladder, 13'
reviews.reviewText: Had to send it back..didn't take into consideration the porch roof needed another 8 ft. will order the 3 story product. Thought product was kind of heavy for a small child to try and use.
reviews.title: 01 September 2010

reviews.name: Kidde Emergency 2-Story Escape Ladder, 13'
reviews.reviewText:
I have a 2nd story and got this for my room in case of emergency fire. it is easy to use but DO NOT take the steps apart. the handles can be "practiced" opening and hooking onto a sill, but the
steps cannot. I just reviewed it, and now know what to do if I ever need it.
Many people dont stop to think who live in apts that this is also a great investment for them.
reviews.title: excellent escape ladder
